item.title: Gina add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Gina add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Gina add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Gina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Gina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Gina add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "I just got out of the hospital. I was in a speed reading accident. I hit a book mark and flew across the room." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Gina add a quote by Desiderius Erasmus Roterodamus
item.description: "When I have a little money, I buy books; and if I have any left, I buy food and clothes." -- Desiderius Erasmus Roterodamus

item.title: Gina add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "Marry me, Rebecca...You might as well say yes. I'll just talk you into it. " -- Nora Roberts
